title: "Sensor for smart textiles survives washing machine, cars and hammers"
excerpt: "If the smart textiles of the future are going to survive all that we throw at them, their components are going to need to be resilient. Now, SEAS researchers have developed an ultra-sensitive, seriously resilient strain sensor that can be embedded in textiles and soft robotic systems."
